aboutUs: The Idea of teaching students who really need help with their acadamics came from analysing hardworking students, who wanted more than what college provides, while maintaining their work/study schedule. Had been in the same shoes, the CEO felt the neccesity to find a way and provide FREE acadamic HELP. Our Tutors are Gradutated from well established/known Colleges/Universities with more than 3.5 GPA or Honor
